sect1.title: Change Log
sect1.para: Please note that the Change Log only lists which editor was responsible for putting the changes into SVN; please read the page in Chapter 1 for details on who wrote what.

listitem.para: [dnicholson] - Fixed libXfont to work with newer versions of FreeType2.
[dj] - Correted incorrect variable in precompiled JDK instructions.
[dj] - Completed cleanup for /etc/X11 changes and /usr/X11R6 removal.

[ken] - Corrected the download locations for goffice.
[ag] - Added header caching support in mutt. Added qdbm as optional dependency.
